comment: Given a subset of multidimensional reals and a set of half-open intervals that covers it, the Lebesgue outer measure of the set is bounded by the generalized sum of the pre-measure of the half-open intervals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
